query:
SELECT DISTINCT c/archetype_details/template_id/value AS TemplateID, e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value AS SubjectID, c/context/other_context[at0001]/items[at0002]/value AS Bericht_ID, c/context/other_context[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.case_identification.v0]/items[at0001]/value/value AS Fall_Kennung, c/content/description[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/value AS Name_der_Prozedur, c/content/description[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/encoding/code_string AS Prozedur_Code, c/content/description[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/encoding/terminology_id/value AS CodyingSystem, c/content/description[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/hyperlink/value AS CodeSystemVersion, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0067]/value/value AS Kategorie_der_Prozedur, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0067]/value/defining_code/terminology_id/value AS KategorieSystem, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0067]/value/defining_code/code_string AS KategorieCode, c/context/start_time/value AS RecordedTime, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/time/value AS PerformedTime, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0063]/value/value AS Seitenlokalisation, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0063]/value/defining_code/terminology_id/value AS Seitenlokalisation_codesystem_id, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0063]/value/defining_code/code_string AS Seitenlokalisation_code_string, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0014]/value AS Durchführungsabsicht, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0005]/value AS Kommentar, c/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.procedure.v1]/description[at0001]/items[at0063]/value AS Körperstelle, e/ehr_id/value AS EHRID, c/uid/value AS CompositionID, c/name/value AS ResourceName, e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/namespace as subjectNamespace, c/composer/external_ref/id/value As ComposerID, c/composer/external_ref/namespace as composerNamespace, c/composer/name As ComposerName
FROM EHR e CONTAINS (COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report.v1] AND COMPOSITION k[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report.v1] AND VERSION v) WHERE c/name/value='KDS_Prozedur' AND k/name/value='UKSH Einwilligung' AND (k/content[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.uksh_einwilligung.v1]/description[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.uksh_consent.v1]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.policy.v1]/items[at0006]/value/defining_code/code_string MATCHES { '1.2.276.0.76.3.1.454.1.100.1.1.1.1', '1.2.276.0.76.3.1.454.1.100.1.1.2.1', '1.2.276.0.76.3.1.454.1.100.1.1.4.1' } ) AND v/commit_audit/time_committed/value >= '{{last_run_time}}' ORDER BY v/commit_audit/time_committed/value DESC
